JobShortDescription: Are you a freelance senior flutter developer who has time to coach a junior? let' see if our client goes for this concept because we have a junior who needs guidance
JobDescription:
If as a Flutter developer you like nothing more than sinking your teeth into a new app to be developed, then you're in the right place with us
Because we are looking for your knowledge of building mobile applications, your ideas about the architecture and design of the app and of course the end result
If you can also work well together in a team, then that's absolutely great
PS
Speak dutch and live in NL
JobCriteria:
3+ years of working with Dart
If you have any native experiences, great!

You like to coach and teach others

**Speak dutch and live in NL**
JobSalaryBenefits:
- A competitive salary and a great remote and flexible working environment

- Working with the latest hardware
- Enthusiastic team
- Full travel allowance
- They encourage training and education for your personal and professional growth
- Good to know, they provide great lunches for everyone in the office, if you come 1 or 2 days a week

For questions about this vacancy, or do you want to know more about who we are, please contact us, Maike or Jacqueline, email: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: Our client develops apps for several clients and is busy. The are looking for new people bu that's hard ;) So here we come, Maike and Jacqueline to help, if it's possible we like to connect the junior developer we have in mind, with a senior who guides the starte. If you have time to do this a few hours a week, please let us know.

JobShortDescription:
As a senior android you develop and create apps that are linked to large backend systems of our customers
It's your job to make the app work well in collaboration with the backend
Would be great if you would join our team in the month of February / March
JobDescription:
As an experienced mobile application developer you like to focus on creating, realizing and maintaining mobile applications
These apps that are linked to large backend systems of our customers
It's your job to make the app work well in collaboration with the backend
You have a professional and open mentality
You're a developer who completes his work and likes to explore and develop new capabilities!
Speak dutch and live in NL

We can't tell you everything we want to tell you about this position in this vacancy text
Are you curious and do you know more about what we build and who we are, please contact jacqueline from The House of Appril


he agencies we work with are looking for app builders who are in the possesion of a Dutch work permit ánd reside in The Netherlands
Unfortunately, our clients do not work with people on a remote basis
JobCriteria:
You are experience with Java for at least 5 years

Your main focus would be on the Android platform


**No secrets for you:**
-Android SDK
-Android Studio
- Kotlin
- Eclipse
- LAMP / LNMP (Linux, Apache/Nginx, MySQL, PHP)
- Implementing XML / JSON RESTful interfaces

- ​​​​​​​Speak dutch and live in NL

**Nice to have**
- Experience with iOS 
- Objective C  and Swift
- HTML/ HTML5
- CSS2 / CSS3 and SOAP


Being fluent in Dutch is an advantage but certainly not a requirement


**Listen HERE to our 6 minutes podcast, with all the tech specifications on Spotify
**
JobSalaryBenefits:
- a good salary 
- Free lunch
- We have an open, pleasant and informal work atmosphere
- The latest (native) smart phone
- The opportunity to grow on a technical, personal and business level

- lot's of freedom and responsibility
- The ability to sleep in, as long as you are in the office before 10
00
- 25 days holiday allowance to have some time off too

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile:
- We are a small, international and dedicated team working on our own app we make for our clients.
- We have an open, pleasant and informal work atmosphere.
- At the moment everyone works from home but our company is located just next to Amsterdam.
- Everyone in the team is driven and loves the job. Working independently on an assignment is therefore a requirement.
- You get a lot of freedom and responsibility working with innovative projects

Ps. we are a Dutch company, for our international colleagues we speak English.


Listen HERE to our 12 minutes company profile podcast on Spotify.

JobShortDescription:
If you a React Native Developer and you're looking forward to a join a company with a product app
You like to upgrade your skills, please respond
JobDescription:
If you a React Native Developer and you're looking forward to a join a company with a product app
You like to upgrade your skills, please respond
As a React Native Developer you will be dedicated to bring the app to the next level
You will be working on several projects nut it's one app
This can be done in the office or you can do it from your own workstation if you only come to the office once a week to consult
You will be researching and building a lot on your own and there will be plenty of support to assist you should you not be able to figure it out
Speak dutch and live in NL
JobCriteria:
- You have 3+ years experience with React Native
- You have experience with Javascript frameworks
- You have experience with Git
- If you have experience with Amazon AWS, that's awesome
- You are curious
- You are pro-active
- **You have a Dutch working visa and live in The Netherlands**
JobSalaryBenefits:
- This vacancy is for a permanent contract
- Depending on your experiences, you can receive shares, these build up to 4,9% in 3 years
- Free delicious lunches
- A lot of atonomy

If you would like to know more about this vacancy and meet our client, please contact Jacqueline, e-mail: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: The company is Dutch but with a lot of international talent.
JobCompany.JobCompanyCulture: Hi there! We are The House of Appril, the only Dutch talent agency specialised in app professionals that helps you with great app development jobs in The Netherlands. We are Firmly rooted in the community and as organiser of the Appril Festival, something we have been doing since 2012! We support the Dutch app community (Appsterdam)  and we have a large network of interesting companies. We provide you with plenty of guidance: online and offline, we support you with your resume, interview advice and our network. The House of Appril's unique approach helps you find your next job or gig.

JobShortDescription: Are you Swift expert with 3 years of app development, looking for a new job with international clients, please read this vacancy and push the apply button!
JobDescription:
You’ll be part of our Development team; we have mobile developers (iOS and Android), backend devs, designers and PO
The team works mostly remote and sometimes we meet at the office
All together we are bringing the apps to the next level
We want to deliver the best experience possible; for our clients and our honor
You will be working with the latest hardware and updating to the latest software version
JobCriteria:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience with iOS development
- Proficiency with modern Swift and Objective-C
- The iOS SDK has little secrets 
- Strong focus on building high-quality user experiences
- Of course you are in the possesion of a Dutch work permit ánd reside in The Netherlands

- Our clients do not work with people on a 100% remote basis

- You need to speak dutch and live in NL
JobSalaryBenefits:
You will receive a competitive salary

In addition, our client offers a generous package of fringe benefits:
Extensive vacation arrangement
Space for personal development
The latest hardware to work with
Reimbursement of travel expenses

For questions about this or the other vacancies, please contact Jacqueline, email: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446
Love to help you with a new job

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: Our client is a digital agency who develops and design products of the highest quality. They create a “first-class” digital strategy for B2B and consumer apps. We develop and design the whole process of Software development, continuous integration & deployment, test and release management. Their team consists of 30 people, some of whom are abroad. They have in-house business developers, designers, testers, backend, front end and app developers. Mainly iOS and Android.
